solution_line_template: Find the total cost of the cappuccinos by multiplying the price by the quantity: {num_cappuccinos} cappuccinos x ${price_cappuccino}/cappuccino = $<<{num_cappuccinos}*{price_cappuccino}={total_cappuccino}>>{total_cappuccino}
Then do the same for the iced teas: {num_iced_teas} iced teas x ${price_iced_tea}/tea = $<<{num_iced_teas}*{price_iced_tea}={total_iced_tea}>>{total_iced_tea}
Then do the same for the cafe lattes: {num_cafe_lattes} lattes x ${price_cafe_latte}/latte = $<<{num_cafe_lattes}*{price_cafe_latte}={total_cafe_latte}>>{total_cafe_latte}
Then do the same for the espressos: {num_espressos} espressos x ${price_espresso} = $<<{num_espressos}*{price_espresso}={total_espresso}>>{total_espresso}
